Package etomica.data

Class DataSourceAcceptanceProbability

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.data.DataSourceAcceptanceRatio
        • etomica.data.DataSourceAcceptanceProbability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource

    public class DataSourceAcceptanceProbability
extends DataSourceAcceptanceRatio
    Data source giving the average acceptance probability of MCMove type moves. Returns acceptance probability as kept by the MCMove.

      • getDataAsScalar

        public double getDataAsScalar​()
        Returns the value of the acceptance ratios as currently kept by the MCMove classes identified with setMove. Each element of the returned array applies to the corresponding element in the MCMove array.
        Overrides:
        getDataAsScalar in class DataSourceAcceptanceRatio
